description.value: For beneficiaries living in long-term care (LTC) facilities, this variable indicates how many daysâ€™ supply of the medication was dispensed by the long-term care pharmacy and provides some details about the dispensing event. This variable is only populated when beneficiary lives in an LTC facility (i.e., when the PTNT_RSDNC_CD variable equals 03). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/submsn_clr_cd
